# Description

I am a PhD student at ErasmusMC-Sophia, focusing on children with a combination of anxiety, depression, attention problems and aggressive behavior, defined as the Dysregulation Phenotype (DP). I am looking at symptom and brain development and the bidirectional relationship between the two over time in children and adolescents drawn from the general population. I am also the co-funder of Rotterdam [RIOT Science Club](https://www.kcl.ac.uk/events/series/riot-science-club), a community providing training in **R**eproducible, **I**nterpretable, **O**pen, and **T**ransparent science.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Elisabet Blok"
special_skill <- c("drinking coffee", "R")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("content/post/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", special_skill, "preregistration", "data sharing", "open source software", "open access", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
